nodes.title: Number Sense
nodes.description: Understanding whole numbers and place value.

nodes.title: Fractions
nodes.description: Mastery of Pieces. Strategic Insight: 'A fraction is just a division problem waiting for a leader.'

nodes.title: Multi-Step Word Problems
nodes.description: Strategic Scaling: A complex problem is just a group of small allies. Break them apart to conquer the whole.

abstractProblems.question: A store sells shirts for $25 each and pants for $40 each. If they sell 3 shirts and 2 pants, what is the total revenue?
abstractProblems.strategicInsight: Logic is your weapon of precision. Measure twice, strike once.

abstractProblems.question: Maria works 15 hours per week at $12/hour. She saves 20% of her earnings. How much does she save weekly?
abstractProblems.strategicInsight: A complex problem is just a group of small allies. Break them apart to conquer the whole.

abstractProblems.question: A car travels 180 miles in 3 hours. What is its average speed?
abstractProblems.strategicInsight: Logic is your weapon of precision. Measure twice, strike once.

concreteProblems.question: Visual: 3 boxes √ó $25 + 2 boxes √ó $40 = ?
concreteProblems.visualInstruction: Show 3 boxes labeled $25 and 2 boxes labeled $40

nodes.title: Rate & Distance Problems
nodes.description: Strategic Scaling: Calculate rates, distances, and time using logical steps.

abstractProblems.question: If a factory produces 240 widgets in 8 hours, how many widgets does it produce per hour?
abstractProblems.strategicInsight: A complex problem is just a group of small allies. Break them apart to conquer the whole.

abstractProblems.question: A train travels 300 miles in 4 hours. If it maintains the same speed, how long to travel 450 miles?
abstractProblems.strategicInsight: A complex problem is just a group of small allies. Break them apart to conquer the whole.

abstractProblems.question: Water flows from a tank at 3 gallons per minute. How long to empty 180 gallons?
abstractProblems.strategicInsight: A complex problem is just a group of small allies. Break them apart to conquer the whole.

nodes.title: Percentage Applications
nodes.description: Strategic Scaling: Apply percentage calculations to real-world scenarios.

abstractProblems.question: A laptop originally costs $800. It's on sale for 25% off. What is the sale price?
abstractProblems.strategicInsight: Logic is your weapon of precision. Measure twice, strike once.

abstractProblems.question: A company's profit increased from $50,000 to $60,000. What percentage increase is this?
abstractProblems.strategicInsight: A complex problem is just a group of small allies. Break them apart to conquer the whole.

abstractProblems.question: If 30% of students are athletes and there are 240 students total, how many are athletes?
abstractProblems.strategicInsight: Logic is your weapon of precision. Measure twice, strike once.

concreteProblems.question: Visual: $800 √ó (1 - 0.25) = ?
concreteProblems.visualInstruction: Show discount calculation with visual breakdown

nodes.title: Proportion & Scaling
nodes.description: Strategic Scaling: Master proportional reasoning and scaling relationships.

abstractProblems.question: If 3 workers can build 2 houses in 6 months, how many houses can 6 workers build in the same time?
abstractProblems.strategicInsight: A complex problem is just a group of small allies. Break them apart to conquer the whole.

abstractProblems.question: A recipe calls for 2 cups of flour for 6 servings. How many cups for 15 servings?
abstractProblems.strategicInsight: A complex problem is just a group of small allies. Break them apart to conquer the whole.

abstractProblems.question: If a map scale is 1 inch = 10 miles, how many miles represent 3.5 inches?
abstractProblems.strategicInsight: A complex problem is just a group of small allies. Break them apart to conquer the whole.

nodes.title: Complex Problem Solving
nodes.description: Strategic Scaling: Combine multiple concepts to solve complex real-world problems.

abstractProblems.question: A contractor charges $50/hour plus $200 materials. If a job takes 6 hours and $400 materials, what's the total cost?
abstractProblems.strategicInsight: A complex problem is just a group of small allies. Break them apart to conquer the whole.

abstractProblems.question: Maria invests $500 at 6% interest. How much will she have after 2 years?
abstractProblems.strategicInsight: A complex problem is just a group of small allies. Break them apart to conquer the whole.

abstractProblems.question: A store offers 30% off, then an additional 10% off on sale price. What's the total discount on a $100 item?
abstractProblems.strategicInsight: A complex problem is just a group of small allies. Break them apart to conquer the whole.

concreteProblems.question: Visual: ($50 √ó 6) + $200 + $400 = ?
concreteProblems.visualInstruction: Show multi-step calculation with visual breakdown
